name: Epic roll
description:
Have you ever imagined being a whole life spinning ?, and besides being a whole life spinning, can you imagine being constantly afraid of falling and end your fragile and short life ?
Well... this game may seem like a simple arcade game to have a good time and train reflexes, but no, it is a deep and sincere metaphor about current life and about nihilistic philosophy.
We spend our lives here and there, stumbling and not enjoying it, it seems unimportant, but there is only one life, and we have to enjoy it to the fullest.
And this brings us "Epic roll", the cube that you drive symbolizes you and your life, advancing to reach the maximum possible distance, avoiding many types of obstacles (all that life puts us), so that at any time you can be wrong and fall (die), having had a life full of fears and not at all enjoyed.
So if you want to stop being another sheep that just "advance and turn" for your life, start by buying and playing Epic roll to understand the metaphors in the depths of your being, and be able, over time, to adapt a most appropriate philosophy for your day to day.

Epic roll is a game that has the perfectly balance between enjoyable and challenging (with difficultie increase ) gameplay

You control a cube moving on a grid board with sides with fall on each side, there will be a lot of things during gameplay that will make you lose, like different types of objets you will find on the board or falling on one of the sides.
There are also surpirses while playing, like objets that maje you invencible during some seconds.
A high score is stored on the game, so try to beat your best marks, but be careful, because the game gets more difficult with the distance.

What to expect:

-Challenging gameplay and difficult increase with time

-Easy to understand and easy to improve on gameplay

-Highscores historical are stored on the game and can be consulted by the players.

-Scenarios are generated randomly, that will bring a different experience every time you play

-Good sound effects and music


How to play:

-You just need to use your mouse to move on the menus and to play, by clicking left mouse button
